item.title: Wierd problem (with pic!) need help

item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Ok listen
go to your item in the config folder
go to your “Dragon plate body” id. when you find it i belive you will see the problem

??? where is the config file i have a 317?
[/quote]

Exactly
go to your “server” -> Config -> Item -> Search for your dplate and you will find the problem[/quote]

incorrect.

Go to class8.java or itemdef.java (Refactored only)

and look for:

Dragon platelegs

Make sure it is only one and post the code here. JUST THAT SNIPPET!
